languages.text: {n}По лицу Кибеллы пробегает слабая улыбка.{/n} "Тогда тень умолкает. Воля Домин — закон".
{n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."
languages.original_text: {n}По лицу Кибеллы пробегает слабая улыбка.{/n} "Тогда тень умолкает. Воля Домин — закон".

traits.locale_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

{n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

languages.text: {n}Una tenue sonrisa ilumina brevemente el rostro de Kibellah.{/n} «Entonces la sombra guardará silencio. La voluntad {mf|del|de la} Domin es ley».
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una tenue sonrisa ilumina brevemente el rostro de Kibellah.{/n} «Entonces la sombra guardará silencio. La voluntad {mf|del|de la} Domin es ley».

languages.text: {n}キベラの顔に一瞬、薄ら笑いが浮かんだ。{/n}「それなら、影は沈黙するでしょう。ドミンの意志は法なのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの顔に一瞬、薄ら笑いが浮かんだ。{/n}「それなら、影は沈黙するでしょう。ドミンの意志は法なのだから」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈脸上闪过一丝苍白的微笑。{/n}“既然如此，影子会保持沉默，因为秘者的意志就是法律。”
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈脸上闪过一丝苍白的微笑。{/n}“既然如此，影子会保持沉默，因为秘者的意志就是法律。”

languages.text: {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln huscht über Kibellahs Gesicht.{/n} "Dann wird der Schatten schweigen. Der Wille {mf|des|der} Domin ist Gesetz."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln huscht über Kibellahs Gesicht.{/n} "Dann wird der Schatten schweigen. Der Wille {mf|des|der} Domin ist Gesetz."

languages.text: {n}Un pâle sourire passe brièvement sur le visage de Kibellah.{/n} « Dans ce cas, votre ombre gardera le silence. La volonté {mf|du|de la} Domin a force de loi. »
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un pâle sourire passe brièvement sur le visage de Kibellah.{/n} « Dans ce cas, votre ombre gardera le silence. La volonté {mf|du|de la} Domin a force de loi. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın yüzünde bir anlığına bezgin bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "O hâlde gölge sükûnete bürünecek. Domin'in arzusu kanundur."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile briefly flickers on Kibellah's face.{/n} "Then the shadow will be silent. The Domin's will is law."
